abstracts.cdata!:
The Agricultural Sector Management and
            Institutional Development Project will strengthen the key
            public management functions of the agricultural ministries
            (economic analysis, policy formulation, investment
            programming, budget preparation and execution, personnel
            management and training). By working through permanent
            government structures, instead of project specific
            management units, the project will carry out effective
            institution building. In addition to these long term goals,
            short term objectives include improved public expenditure
            programming capacity and the development of cost effective
            personnel management systems.
